name: Emet Dreams
description:
A princess on a journey to reclaim her kingdom using a power to shift between  reality and unreality

                                                      

Our magnum opus done in a week for the Brackeys game jam 2022/1! Hope you like it, cause we sure do!

Controls:

  Keyboard

  • Movement: ARROW KEYS / WSAD
  • Jump: C / SPACE
  • Slide: X / SHIFT
  • Shift reality: Z / Y

   Controller

  • Movement: LEFT STICK
  • Jump: A
  • Slide:  X
  • Shift reality: B/Y
LIOH · Emet Dreams

We are a team of three beings called Bell Hat Games. Wanna see more fun and fresh game goodness like this? Go check us out!
